name: zenroomjs
description: wasm wrapper of zenroom, a secure and small virtual machine for crypto language processing
author: Puria Nafisi Azizi <puria@dyne.org>

scripts.clean: rimraf src/lib && cd zenroom && make clean
scripts.pretranspile: yarn compile && mkdir -p src/lib && cp -v zenroom/build/npm/z* src/lib && mkdir dist
